actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

official_title: Recognizing the historic abolitionist events surrounding the Pearl, and honoring its legacy in American history.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: This resolution honors the legacy of those who furthered freedom in the Pearl Incident and recognizes their historical importance. (On April 15, 1848, 77 slaves attempted to flee the District of Columbia and Alexandria, Virginia, on the ship the Pearl.)

titles.title: Recognizing the historic abolitionist events surrounding the Pearl, and honoring its legacy in American history.
Recognizing the historic abolitionist events surrounding the Pearl, and honoring its legacy in American history.
